SEARCH
Package game.level.entities

Interface Entities

All Known Implementing Classes:
Door, Exit, Monster, Treasure
public interface Entities
Entities This interface is used to manage the entities. The entities are represented by the characters 'E' (EXIT const), 'P' (DOOR const), 'T' (TREASURE const) and 'M' (MONSTER const) in the level file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final List<Pos>
    allEntities
    Each entities has a list of all the entities position

    • isit

      Boolean isit (Pos p)
      This method checks if a position is an entity.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the position is an entity, false otherwise
